mapper.insert: insert into tb_grade (grade_id, grade_course_id, grade_student_id, grade_number) values (#{gradeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradeCourseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradeStudentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradeNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select grade_id, grade_course_id, grade_student_id, grade_number from tb_grade
